examples.korean: The President has great personal charisma. 발음듣기 대통령은 인간적인 카리스마가 대단하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The President has great personal charisma. 발음

examples.korean: Like all truly charismatic people, he can work his magic on both men and women. 발음듣기 진정한 카리스마를 지닌 모든 사람들이 그렇듯, 그의 매력은 남녀 모두에게 먹혀 들 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Like all truly charismatic people, he can work his magic on both men and women. 발음

examples.korean: a lack of charisma 발음듣기 카리스마 부족 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
Barack Obama is a very charismatic individual. 발음듣기 버락 오바마는 아주 카리스마 넘치는 인물이다. DARAKWON
examples.english: Barack Obama is a very charismatic individual. 발음

examples.korean: Aspiring singers, after joining the agency, underwent years of thorough, systematic vocal and dance training before they made their debut as singers. Through the rigorous years of pre-debut training, the aspiring singers were reborn as professional, charismatic performers on the stage. 발음듣기 유망한 가수들이 에이전시에 들어와 가수 데뷔까지 몇 년 간의 체계적인 발성과 댄스 훈련을 받았다. 혹독한 훈련을 통해, 유망한 연습생들은 무대 위 프로페셔널하고 카리스마 넘치는 가수로 다시 태어났다. The Korea Times
examples.english: Aspiring singers, after joining the agency, underwent years of thorough, systematic vocal and dance training before they made their debut as singers. Through the rigorous years of pre-debut training, the aspiring singers were reborn as professional, charismatic performers on the stage. 발음
